FuncDef: This command defines the length of lease-time that is provided to DHCP clients. By default the local-proxy-server will always make use of the lease-time information provide by either a RADIUS or DHCP server.
CLIs: lease-time [ days <days> ] [ hrs <hours> ] [ min <minutes> ] [ sec <seconds> ] [ radius-override ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the local-proxy-server will use the configured lease-time information to provide DHCP clients. This is supported only in the config>service>vpls>sap>dhcp>proxy-server context.
Specifies the number of days that the given IP address is valid. Values-0 to 3650.
Specifies the number of hours that the given IP address is valid. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the number of minutes that the given IP address is valid. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the number of seconds that the given IP address is valid. Values-0 to 59.
